original_text: But they did not turn away from the sins of the house of Jeroboam, which he had caused Israel to commit; they continued in them. Also, the Asherah pole remained standing in Samaria.
korean_text: 그들이 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 여로보암 집의 죄에서 떠나지 아니하고 그 안에서 따라 행하며 또 사마리아에 아세라 목상을 그냥 두었더라

sentences.original_text: But they did not turn away from the sins
which he had caused Israel to commit
Also, the Asherah pole remained standing
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 아세라 상은 계속 서 있었으며
